actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny a deduction for amounts paid as restitution for other damages for violations of law involving fraud.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a business expense deduction for any amount paid as restitution or other damages for violation of the law involving fraud.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny a deduction for amounts paid as restitution for other damages for violations of law involving fraud.
